entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers later in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
